dialogue.text: Tonight was absolutely AWESOME. Nobody even stood a CHANCE against you!

Those people were leagues below me,
\nthough. A TRUE opponent wouldn't have\nbeen so easy!
Oh come on, don't act like you weren't\nnervously sweating in that last battle...
Pffft, you're scared of LIGHTNING. Cut me some slack!
Haha, you have a point.
All that aside, though… I'm absolutely\npooped.
Bobbing your head back and forth\nendlessly is a lot more tiring than\nyou'd think.
Yeah, I'm ready to crash early tonight. I think I've earned a good sleep.
Luckily there shouldn't be anybody else to get in our way, it's a straight shot home\nfrom here!
Yup, absolutely no more trouble from this point forward!
Wait a minute, who’'s tha-
Oh.
My.
GOD.
Jinxed it.
BOYFRIEND! Is it really you?
Do I... know you?
Probably not…...
But now you do!
It's an absolute pleasure to meet you\nafter all this time!
Hold on, you can understand me?
I was just thinking out loud. Figured all that you'd hear is “''beep skiddily boop''.
Of course I can!
You really think that I wouldn't know how to speak Boyfriend?
I don't know... …would you? I don't even\nknow who you are.
The name's Lexi! I'm your biggest fan!
Just ask any member of the Unofficial\nBoyfriend Fanpage, and they'll tell you!
''Biggest Fan?'' I didn't know Boyfriend\nhad fans. Or a fanpage.
Of course he has fans! He beat your\nparents TWICE at their own game!
That's enough to get ANYBODY talking.
Really? I thought the Dearests were a\ncakewalk.
That’'s just it! You're so skilled at funkin' that you make light work of even the\ndeadliest opponents!
There are thousands of people who admire what you do...
And I'm one of them!
Yeah...… your hat, hair and shirt made that REEEEEAL subtle.
Was that supposed to be sarcasm? I'm not good at sarcasm.
BUT IT'S OK! All that matters is that I'm right here, next to my idol, in the flesh!
So what'll it be? You want me to sign\nsomething, take a selfie?
Actually... uh...
I was wondering if maaaaaybe we could\nsing a song?
Sorry, but I just got done singing songs\nwith literal gods. I'm kinda burnt out on\n the vocal department.
Awww, come on Boyfriend! She really\ncares about you.
Just one song couldn't hurt, right?
Alright, fine, but only because Girlfriend\nseems so insistent on it.
AWESOME! I promise I'll make this worth your time!
